title: ServiceDockerData
description:
Static metadata for a service injected in the image labels

This is one to one with node-meta-v0.0.1.json

name.title: Name
name.description: short, human readable name for the node

description.title: Description
description.description: human readable description of the purpose of the node
examples: The mother of all nodes, makes your numbers shine!

key.title: Key
key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

url.title: Url
examples: https://travis-ci.org/ITISFoundation/osparc-simcore 'State of CI: build, test and pushing images'

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: email to correspond to the authors about the node

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: definition of the inputs of this node

^[-_a-zA-Z0-9]+$.title: ServiceInput
^[-_a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Metadata on a service input port

displayOrder.title: Displayorder
displayOrder.description: DEPRECATED: new display order is taken from the item position. This will be removed.

type.title: Type
type.description: data type expected on this input glob matching for data type is allowed

contentSchema.title: Contentschema
contentSchema.description: jsonschema of this input/output. Required when type='ref_contentSchema'

fileToKeyMap.title: Filetokeymap
fileToKeyMap.description: Place the data associated with the named keys in files

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Units, when it refers to a physical quantity

widget.title: Widget
widget.description: custom widget to use instead of the default one determined from the data-type

examples.label: Input files - file-wo-widget
examples.description: Files downloaded from service connected at the input

examples.description: Time to wait before completion

examples.description: Time to wait before completion

examples.description: Some array of numbers
